mapper.insert: insert into review (prno, mno, content, rating, file_addr) values (#{prno}, #{mno}, #{content}, #{rating}, #{fileAddr});
mapper.select: select count(rno) from review where is_del = 'N' and prno = #{prno}
select count(rno) from review where is_del = 'N' and prno = #{prno}
select * from review where is_del = 'N' and prno = #{prno} order by rno desc limit #{startIndex}, #{qty};
select count(*) from likes where rno = #{rno} and mno = ${mno};
mapper.delete: delete from likes where rno = #{rno} and mno = #{mno};
mapper.update: update review set like_cnt = like_cnt + #{num} where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(case when rating = 5 then 1 end) as cnt5, count(case when rating in (4, 4.5) then 1 end) as cnt4, count(case when rating in (3, 3.5) then 1 end) as cnt3, count(case when rating in (2, 2.5) then 1 end) as cnt2, count(case when rating in (1, 1.5) then 1 end) as cnt1 from review where prno = #{prno} and is_del = 'N'
